body:
How did i get warned for bad sportsmanship. Some moderators don't know how to moderate.

So someone told someone else to not say L because it was considered bad sportsmanship. But i never did the following and i got warned. Im not pissed about the warn just confused how I got it.
http://imgur.com/a/L3yLd
I guess avicus rules need to be more specific because apparently typing LOL or asking what EZ means is having poor sportsmanship

title: Question

replies.body: Its funny really i just asked if EZ meant boss ass bitch and typed L O L spaced out and got warned for bad sportsmanship
replies.body_tagged: Its funny really i just asked if EZ meant boss ass bitch and typed L O L spaced out and got warned for bad sportsmanship

replies.body: well you were misleading people into thinking you just said "L" or "EZ" so i kinda understand why they punished you
replies.body_tagged: well you were misleading people into thinking you just said "L" or "EZ" so i kinda understand why they punished you

replies.body:
Heey Inaeyer,

Please make an appeal next time.
https://avicus.net/appeal
Since this isn't the right section for that kind of thread, I'm going to lock this.

Locking...
